jp_text: マ～！！ ま　待て　引っ張るな！ すぐに何か持ってくっから！！
google_translated: Ma!!Don't wait!I will bring something soon!!

en_text: Oh, you're back?
jp_text: って　帰ってたのか。 ど～だ？持って来たか？
google_translated: Did you go home?Is it?Did you bring it?

en_text: How'd it go? Did you bring it back? sorry about the trouble.
jp_text: 世話になったな。 は？

en_text: That toy was nowhere to be found.
jp_text: 例のおもちゃが 見当たらなくてな。

en_text: I consulted with the Great Demon Lord,
jp_text: 大魔王様に相談したところ→
google_translated: Where I consulted the Daemon King →

en_text: and the way to stop his night crying  is to take him back to the Demon World.
jp_text: 夜泣きが　おさまるまで 魔界に連れ帰ることになった。
google_translated: It was decided to take back to the devil until the night cry.

en_text: S-Seriously? your formal thank you will  come at a later date.
jp_text: え…マジかよ。 正式な礼は改めてな。

en_text: H-Hey!
jp_text: お　おい…。

en_text: Baby Beel... yes, i'm sorry.
jp_text: ベル坊…。 マー！！ はいはい　ごめんごめん。

en_text: Hey Tatsumi, you need to  put Beel-chan to sleep.
jp_text: ちょっと　辰巳。そろそろ ベルちゃん　寝かさないと…→
google_translated: A little while ago.Soon he is not Bele-chan, if you're going to sleep ... →

en_text: You're a wreck! Did you  get into a fight again?
jp_text: って　あんたボロボロじゃない。 またケンカ？

en_text: For some weird reason  everyone just came at me...
jp_text: 何か今日は妙に 色んな奴に絡まれて…。
google_translated: Something is tangled with strange people today ....

en_text: Maybe I'll have Baby Beel  sleep with Mom tonight.
jp_text: ベルちゃん　母さんの所で 寝かせてみようか？→
google_translated: Let's let go to bed at the place of Bell-chan mother?→

en_text: Look at him. He's getting ready to cry again.
jp_text: また泣くわよ　この様子だと。

en_text: I'm the only one who can deal with this guy.
jp_text: 俺しか　こいつの相手 できね～だろ。
google_translated: I can only do this party.

en_text: Uh, sure, but what the hell is this?
jp_text: いや　んな事より　何だこれ？ ギョギョー！！
google_translated: What is it more than this?Giogyo!!

en_text: I told you, it's a toy that  the Master enjoys, remember?
jp_text: だから　坊っちゃまお気に入りの おもちゃだと言ったろう。
google_translated: So I would like to say that my favorite boy was my favorite.

en_text: The cries of the Demon  World's Great Sea Serpent.
jp_text: 魔界の大海蛇の鳴き声でな。
google_translated: In the sound of the ocean snake of the devil.

en_text: It's obviously even louder  than his night crying!
jp_text: 明らかに夜泣きより でけ～じゃね～かよ！！

en_text: I got nothing to do with this!
jp_text: つ～か　てめえ　のんきに 寝てんじゃねぇ！！
google_translated: I'm going to sleep on my mind!!

en_text: Master, you mustn't enter there!
jp_text: まあ　坊っちゃま　いけません。 そんなところに…。
google_translated: Well, I can not miss it.To such a place ....

en_text: What? You want me to board as well?
jp_text: ダブ！ ええっ　私も乗るんですか！？

en_text: Oh, this is actually quite nice.
jp_text: おお　これは楽ちんですね。 ダ！！
